name: metaphysical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the part of philosophy that is about understanding existence and knowledge: Most teenagers ask themselves metaphysical questions such as "What is love?" and "What is death?" He is practical and not given to metaphysical speculation. See
metaphysics
More examplesFewer examplesShe claims that metaphysical beliefs are the result of our earliest experiences and the culture around us.There is something exquisitely metaphysical, even mystical, about his approach to nature's complexity.At the heart of the play lies a witty metaphysical conceit.A singer can use music to transform everyday life into something metaphysical and profound.

relating to the part of philosophy that deals with existence and knowledge: metaphysical questions about the nature of the universe
